summary: change the appearance of Jenessa the drow.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted a smaller, prettier version of Jenessa, couldnt find it so i resorted to make my own, not sure shes pretty in vanilla skyrim so ive added some info about mods i use to make her pretty at the end of this readme. She can now level to level 79.
Not too pretty but smoother face.

V3 fix the hair duplicate

Enjoy!
Remzy

Installation:
Drop everything in the skyrim folder - enable the module using your favorite module loader.

Requirement:
ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/[/url]

Uninstallation:
Delete the module, or remove from the module loader, mod is cosmetic so nothing should change aside from jenessa's look.

Known Issue:
-

Credits:
I use one texture from the Natural Eyes-3589-1-4 by nevenbridge81, I suggest you get it all, its a great texture replacer!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/[/url]
Apachii for the hair, great stuff as always.
---------------
I am using...
Skyrim script thingy, very important to mod your game
Also known as SKSE
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]
SkyUI - A must have
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/[/url]
Body replacer:
Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente   
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/[/url]
Preset for body:
ALSL Body - CBBE BBP TBBP HDT Bodyslide presets by AlexSlesh
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31926/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31926/[/url]
Physic for bouncy bewbs and arses:
HDT Physics Extensions by HydrogensaysHDT
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/[/url]
skeleton to make the magic bounce happen:
XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/[/url]
skin texture
True Daughters of Skyrim by betterbecause
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45453/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45453/[/url]
author: Remzy
